member.name: T:ProgramTests.AcceptInvitationTest
member.summary: This Test is for verificates if a Company can accept an invitation to the platform.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.InviteCompanyTest.InviteCompany
member.summary: This test proves that as an admin I can create an invitation. As we can't expect a certain invitation code because it's generated randomly, we check if the list of invitations has the same number of invitations as expected

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyCategoryFound
member.summary: This test proves that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's by the category.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyCategoryNotFound
member.summary: This test proves that if an entrepreneur searches for a category that didn't exist it returns a list with 0 elements.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyKeywordsFound
member.summary: This test proves that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's with a keyword.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyKeywordsNotFound
member.summary: This test proves that if an entrepreneur searches for a keyword that isn't included in a publication it returns a list with 0 elements.

member.name: M:ProgramTests.SearchOffersTest.SearchOffersbyZone
member.summary: This test proves that an entrepreneur is able to search material publication's by the zone.
